A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Ignore the trolls who are only here to make trouble. They were clearly unloved as children.

This is a fresh\, well thought out take on SW that we have not seen on the big screen before (though we have seen much of it in the in-canon animated series).

Nothing here is truly out of step with any of the other eight movies (the seven episodes and ROGUE ONE) or the TV shows. In fact\, this is probably the most thought provoking film in the universe to date and deserves repeated viewings.

As someone who has lived with SW for 40 years\, I can state confidently this is an excellent entry in the series and something I've waited for since 1980.
